Package com.transportexchangegroup.wortel

Interface CommandHandler<A extends AbstractAggregate,C extends Command>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddLoadQuoteCommandHandler, ChangeLoadCreationDateCommandHandler, CreateLoadCommandHandler, ValidatedCommandHandler
public interface CommandHandler<A extends AbstractAggregate,C extends Command>
Classes handling commands for an aggregate should extend this interface. Commands and aggregates are matched exactly, so `HandlerA implements CommandHandler<AggregateA, CommandA>` will only handle commands of type CommandA for aggregate of type AggregateA, even though there might be an CommandB class descended from CommandA and AggregateB descended from AggregateA. Right now, only direct inheritance is handled properly, so `HandlerB extends HandlerA` may lead to errors unless HandlerB also implements CommandHandler.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      CommandResult handle(A aggregate, C command, Map<String,String> properties)
      Creates a CommandResult based on a command and an aggregate.
      Parameters:
      aggregate - the aggregate the command is for
      command - the command being handled
      properties - additional properties passed with the Pulsar message containing the command
      Returns:
      CommandResult containing events resulting from handling the command
